casebody.data:
STATE
v.
JACOBS. No. COA06-1652. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed January 15, 2008. Certification Date February 4, 2008. Appeal from New Hanover (05CRS14256, 05CRS53291, 04CRS64856).

Case reported without published opinion. Jacobs appeal: No error in part, dismissed in part and dismissed in part without prejudice. Criego appeal: No error.
